mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(pname, image, price, uploaddate, deadlinedate, hitcount, ID, bestmoney, admin, category, auctionmenu, deal) VALUES(#{pname},#{image},#{price},#{uploaddate},#{deadlinedate},#{hitcount},#{ID},#{bestmoney},#{admin},#{category},#{auctionmenu},#{deal})
mapper.select: select * from product where auctionmenu='일반' order by uploaddate desc;
select * from product where auctionmenu='블라인드' order by uploaddate desc;
SELECT * FROM product order by hitcount desc;
SELECT pno, uploaddate, deadlinedate, (TIMESTAMPDIFF(day, NOW(), deadlinedate)+1) as timeout from product order by timeout asc;
